item.description:
NEEDTOBREATHE is a rock/pop band with Ben Rector as the opening act. They will be going to the House of Blues in Boston after they visit little old Portland. The show is all ages. The doors open at 6:00 but I thought that it would be more fun to go out to eat than sit around waiting for the opening act. I like the State because you can sit in the seats, stand/dance near the stage or hang out in the bar area.

If you would like to meet and have dinner I have made reservations for the Korea House down the road for 5:00. We can do introductions and get to talk before the music. If not then we will go from the restaurant to the State Theatre and look for people outside until 7:00PM. Please let me know if you are going to be going out to eat with us when you RSVP.

Please check out these links to see if you would like to join us.

http://www.needtobreathe.net/home/

http://youtu.be/yq1H3l7kyYU

http://www.allmenus.com/me/portland/294316-korea-house/menu/

Cost = $25

$22 NEEDTOBREATHE Ticket + $2.00 PayPal Fee + $1 meet up fee = $25.00

Please note that I need to collect all the money by March 17 so that I can buy the tickets. Because of this, there are NO REFUNDS.

I hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Michelle's table at Korea house or I will be outside the State Theatre in a green coat and black hat until 7:00
item.name: NEEDTOBREATHE at State Theatre and Dinner at Korea House
